availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Madison County, Kentucky. Born c1821. Married to Hannah E. Howard Roberts on January 30, 1851. Father of Thomas J. Roberts, Robert Th. Roberts, and Sarah Q. Roberts. Married to Elizabeth Lowry Roberts on March 5, 1864. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District Three, p. 618
